original_title:
Ron DeSantis says states like California run a mail in ballot fraud network to steal elections. 

He says they’ll mass send out mail in ballots, 3-4+ mail in ballots per address, then Democrat operatives will go out and ballot harvest.   — The Donald
article_summary: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis accuses California of running a mail-in ballot fraud network, alleging mass distribution of multiple ballots per address and ballot harvesting by Democrat operatives. Critics claim this practice targets vulnerable groups like the homeless and disabled.</s>
